snippet: As a torrent of faulty trades spewed from a Knight Capital Group trading program on Wednesday, no one at the firm managed to stop it for more than a half-hour.
abstract: As a torrent of faulty trades spewed from a Knight Capital Group trading program on Wednesday, no one at the firm managed to stop it for more than a half-hour.

byline.original: By JESSICA SILVER-GREENBERG, NATHANIEL POPPER and MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Trading Program Ran Amok, With No 'Off' Switch
